summary: Diff updates backend and frontend to use exact admin credentials joana/joana123 and adds post-login permission refetch logic, but evidence is insufficient that AdminAccessGate was updated to provide the required blocked-state navigation/re-login actions, and some new AdminLoginPage UI strings appear unrelated (English copy).

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure AdminAccessGate provides an auth-required state with a working button to navigate to Admin Login when blocked, and offers a working re-login action that clears validation and routes to Admin Login when authenticated but lacking backend admin permission.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows changes to login flow and profile owner-panel navigation, but does not show any changes to the AdminAccessGate component itself (or equivalent gate UI) implementing the required blocked-state buttons/actions. File summaries mention Inventory page passes onNavigate to the gate, but do not provide evidence of the gate rendering the required CTAs.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (mentions ControleDeEstoquePage passes onNavigate to gate)
frontend/src/pages/ControleDeEstoquePage.tsx (referenced only via summary, no gate UI evidence)

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced/expanded English user-facing copy in AdminLoginPage (e.g., error/help text and headings) rather than keeping Portuguese UI copy.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest focuses on fixing admin credentials and access flow; it does not request changing UI language/copy. The diff shows multiple English strings in the admin login page.
